bot_config {"Bullet": "WOW"}
insert_channel {"id": 1, "user_id": 1, "name": "foobar", "prefix": "+", "bot_name": "hortbot", "active": true}

handle hortbot @id=b2493833-7fbf-4a6c-815f-f07eb501ebcf;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+command add pan FOUND THE (_PARAMETER_CAPS_), HAVE YE?
send hortbot #foobar WOW command pan added

handle hortbot @id=59ed3f3c-7588-45dc-bc65-b6521e12dd3a;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+bullet COOL
send hortbot #foobar COOL bullet changed to COOL

handle hortbot @id=b1baef69-005b-4c2a-99e3-4bc39868bba1;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+bullet reset
send hortbot #foobar WOW bullet reset to default

handle hortbot @id=be2fd393-d224-4257-bd7e-29fd35ffb823;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+bullet
send hortbot #foobar WOW bullet is WOW
